md:
giải nghĩa từ "decorated" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Decorated (verb)

* Meaning: to make something look more attractive by adding decorations or ornaments.
* Vietnamese: trang trí
* Example sentence: The hotel room was decorated with flowers and balloons for the wedding reception.
* Related words: decoration, ornament, embellish, adorn.

Decorated (adjective)

* Meaning: having decorations or ornaments added to make it look more attractive.
* Vietnamese: được trang trí
* Example sentence: The decorated cake was the centerpiece of the party.
* Related words: decorative, ornate, embellished, adorned.

Note: The verb "decorated" can also mean to award someone a medal or other honor, but this meaning is less common.

Example sentences:

* The general was decorated for his bravery in battle. (verb)
* The decorated hero was celebrated in the parade. (adjective)
